thread.title: GoPioneering "Northern Sky Blue Edition" Selfie Stick by Synturi Outdoors (for GoPro, Iphone, Android, Samsung and DSLR Cameras) Offers a New Product to Give Consumers a Choice in Color While Keeping Quality & Versatility Top of Mind
thread.title_full: GoPioneering "Northern Sky Blue Edition" Selfie Stick by Synturi Outdoors (for GoPro, Iphone, Android, Samsung and DSLR Cameras) Offers a New Product to Give Consumers a Choice in Color While Keeping Quality & Versatility Top of Mind

author: prbuzz.com
title: GoPioneering "Northern Sky Blue Edition" Selfie Stick by Synturi Outdoors (for GoPro, Iphone, Android, Samsung and DSLR Cameras) Offers a New Product to Give Consumers a Choice in Color While Keeping Quality & Versatility Top of Mind
text:
Baltimore Maryland (PRBuzz) August 26 2015 The GoPioneering Northern Sky Blue 3 in 1 Selfie Stick just released by Synturi Outdoors provides consumers in the market for a brilliantly colorful way to capture unique single or group selfies.
The Northern Sky Blue Selfie Stick is an extremely beautiful eye catching blue that will be found attarctive by those potential users looking for a selfie stick that offers individuality, breaking away from the main black color used by most selfie stick manufacturers nowadays.
The New Northern Sky Blue Stick still offers the same Premium Quality Parts, Accessories and Features of the Original Mightnight Black Pearl version released earlier in 2015.
A review of what makes the Northern Sky Blue Edition unique in the marketplace:
- Premium Quality Aluminium Extendable sections, enabling lengths from 15.5 inches to almost 36 inches in length
- Universal Mounting Head which adapts to all GoPro Hero Cameras, Iphone 4 - 6, Android and Galaxy S series smartphones as well as most DSLR Cameras that Use the standard 1/4 inch tripod mounting thread
- Comes Equipped with Gopro tripod mount/nut and screw as well as Smartphone Mount for phones from 2 1/4 inches wide up to 3 3/8 inches wide, the standard thread is on the head at all times and is ready to mount DSLR Cameras without any additional accessories
- Custom Heavy Duty Adjustable Wrist strap to allow peace of mind from dropping stick with expensive camera attched to stick while capturing action pictures or videos
- Extra Soft/Long hand grip to provide comfort during extended periods of filming
- Water Drainage Hole to aid in properly draining any water trapped inside stick when used for underwater purposes (performed by unscrewing of wrist strap mounting screw)
- Bonus Threaded Bottom of stick also acts as Tripod mounting thread allowing the stick to mounted on any Tripod that has standard 1/4 inch threaded screw
- Lifetime Warranty when purchased through Synturi Outdoors
Synturi Outdoors excelled at creating a top quality product when it initially developed the the original Midnight Black Pearl version which was very well recevied by consumers.
There is every indication that the new GoPioneering "Northern Sky Blue Edition" Selfie Stick will be enjoyed equally by the masses.
Greg Baxter
SynturiOutdoors.com
